author: ylavic
msg: mpm_event: follow up to r1639614 (trunk) and r1642858 (2.4.x).
Notify suspend in any case when starting lingering close (blocking),
and outside the lingering queue's critical section.

author: elecharny
msg: o Declared some RGB colors as constants, and used the most frequent of those colors
o Only use increments of 32 for any color (ie 0, 32, 64, etc).

author: kwall
msg: QPID-6253: [Java Broker] Name the AMQP acceptor threads to carry a descriptive name and the port number for which they operate.

author: clement
msg: Support the instance bundle context injection for instances declared in @Configuration
